meanings.meaning: an attempt to green industry bosses

examples.korean: The government was in the process of dismantling the state-owned industries. 발음듣기 정부에서는 국영 산업체들에 대한 해체 절차를 밟고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government was in the process of dismantling the state-owned industries. 발음

examples.korean: a plea to industries to stop pollution 발음듣기 산업체들에 대한 공해 중단 간청 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a plea to industries to stop pollution 발음

examples.korean: an attempt to green industry bosses 발음듣기 산업체 사장들을 환경 문제에 관심을 갖게 만들려는 시도 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an attempt to green industry bosses 발음

examples.korean: Each year two teachers are seconded to industry for six months. 발음듣기 매년 두 명의 교사가 6개월간 산업체로 파견 근무를 나간다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Each year two teachers are seconded to industry for six months. 발음

examples.korean: Industries had to adjust to peacetime conditions; factories had to be retooled for civilian needs. 발음듣기 산업체들은 평화시의 상태로 조정되어야 했고, 공장들은 민간의 요구에 맞춰서 재정비되어야 했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Industries had to adjust to peacetime conditions; factories had to be retooled for civilian needs. 발음
